fixed_skill.desc:
Increase party's Attack by 12.0%/12.6%/13.2%. For every 500 of the user's Attack, increase allies' Attack by 0.8%/0.8%/0.8% more (up to 6%). Lasts for 3 turns.
Also, grant Purifying Flames to the main target for 3 turns.
Purifying Flames: When dealing skill damage to foes, 75% chance to inflict Burn on 1 random foe.
fixed_skill.name: Purifying Flames

innate_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to 1 foe equal to 121.7/127.8/133.9% of Attack. 67.6/71.0/74.4% chance to inflict Burn for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Agidyne

innate_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 65.8/70.0/74.2% of Attack. Gain 1 to 2 Blessing stacks.
innate_skill.name: Makougaon

passive_skill.desc:
Increase Attack by 29.1%.
At the start of battle, gain 4 Holy Flame stacks, and every 2 turns, inflict Burn on 1 random foe.
When allies inflict an elemental ailment, gain 1 Holy Flame stack for 3 turns. If the ailment inflicted is Burn, gain 1 more Holy Flame stack. Holy Flame stacks up to 10 times, and up to 2 stacks can be gained from 1 skill.
When an ally uses a skill, if Holy Flame is at 4 or more stacks, spend all Holy Flame stacks to increase the party's damage by 1% per stack for 2 turns. Also, 50% chance to inflict Burn on 1 random foe.
passive_skill.name: Flaming Chariot

passive_skill.desc:
Increase Attack by 29.1%.
At the start of battle, gain 8 Holy Flame stacks, and every 2 turns, inflict Burn on 1 random foe.
When allies inflict an elemental ailment, gain 1 Holy Flame stack for 3 turns. If the ailment inflicted is Burn, gain 1 more Holy Flame stack. Holy Flame stacks up to 10 times, and up to 2 stacks can be gained from 1 skill.
When an ally uses a skill, if Holy Flame is at 4 or more stacks, spend all Holy Flame stacks to increase the party's damage by 1% per stack for 2 turns. Also, 50% chance to inflict Burn on 1 random foe.
passive_skill.name: Flaming Chariot I

showtime_skill.desc: Increase party's damage by 29.5%/31.6%/33.6% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
